alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Mendocino Interior (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued March 12 at 9:55AM PDT until March 15 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Eureka CA has issued a Flood Watch for the following rivers in California... Russian River near Hopland affecting Southeastern Mendocino Interior zone. For the Russian River...including Hopland...flooding is possible. Additional information is available at weather.gov/eka. The next statement will be issued this afternoon by 500 PM PDT. && ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Russian River near Hopland. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Flooding of Highway 175 is expected at the approaches to the Russian River bridge. Expect flooding of cropland on the right bank of river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 AM PDT Sunday the stage was 9.4 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late Tuesday morning and the river is forecast to crest near 15.5 feet Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
